name: Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - Full Metal Rocket
name_original: Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - Full Metal Rocket
description:
Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - Full Metal Rocket is an action-shooter game developed by The Farm 51. It came out on 26-04-2013. It was published by Nordic Games Publishing. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Painkiller: Hell & Damnation - Full Metal Rocket is available on PC.
